page.title: 14Clubs-Broughton Gifford
page.content: In this category are included other groups and committees who hold social and fund raising events throughout the year ie dances, dinners and whist drives. All are listed according to venue. Village Hall- Mothers and toddlers, Playgroup, Youth club, Skittles, W I, 60+ and Village Hall Committee. Methodist schoolroom- Ladies circle and Brownies. Scout Hut- Cubs, Scouts and Guides. In Homes-Mothers Union, Conservative Assn., Gardening Club and Parochial Church Council. Public House-Darts and Cribbage. The Common- Football and Bowls. Other events organised in the area by ad hoc groups on an irregular basis are bazaars for cancer research, the Methodists and Church, Produce Show, Harvest Supper and Pony Club events.
